replies.msg:
打開Tg，驚見有如下通知

Incomplete login attempt. Dear XXX, we detected an attempt to log into your account from a new device on XX/05/2020 at 15:39:44 UTC.

Device: Android
Location: Uzbekistan (IP = XXX.XXX.XXX.XX)

Nobody gained access to your chats because the login was not completed. The code was entered correctly, but no correct password was given.

If this wasn't you, you can terminate the incomplete login in Settings > Devices (or Privacy & Security > Active Sessions).

我個account 係：
1. 用假電話登記的
2. 密碼連我自己都唔記得
3. 所有Privacy都係Nobody

對方嘗試登入，又有Code，即係佢有辦法係我set左nobody can see my number 的時候得到呢個假電話號碼並且利用呢個電話號碼去收code。

請問有無咩潛在風險？我依家應該點做好？
各位巴絲都留意下。

各位巴絲都留意下。

replies.msg:
用text now?
因為你冇定時入text now報到
所以佢會將你個fake no. 攞俾其他人用
如果冇記錯應該係因為咁

replies.msg:
唔會，因為你冇係textnow報到
佢就會當係空號
